title: Hassan the Rope-Seller

source_text.text:
Hassan, a rope-seller, is hired by an ogre and discovers a captive peri maiden. She urges him to flee with her and gives him ashes, a thorn twig, and a jug of water.
They run; the ogre follows.
Hassan throws the ashes, which whirl into a dust storm. He throws the thorn twig; it grows into a barrier of briars. He throws the water; it becomes a river. The ogre cannot cross and quits the chase.
Hassan and the peri return to town. The peri remains in human form and marries him; the ogre’s threat ends.

source_text_persian.text: حسن ریسمان‌فروش با پری اسیر دیو می‌گریزد. خاکستر طوفان، خار بوته و آب رود می‌شود و دیو جا می‌ماند. پری در شهر می‌ماند و با حسن عروسی می‌کند و خطر دیو تمام می‌شود.

thinking_process: Magic-flight with three obstacles cast by the hero; helper is a peri maiden captive to an ogre.

motif.obstacle_thrower: Hassan throws each object; peri maiden plans escape.
